long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to label the jobs on Linkedin. 

You can assign a label to a job, which will be saved locally in your browser. Later, when you browse the jobs again, you can see all the assigned labels. Use this extension, and don't worry to forget which jobs you already applied for. 

How to use:
1. Install the extension.
2. Browse the jobs and assign labels as you like.
